Text:
Thank you for the posting.
If you have flash for the Apple TV 1 for Windows then please post.

JR,

I don't have ATV Flash for the 1st gen, but this tut:

http://www.xbmchub.com/blog/2012/04/23/install-xbmc-on-the-apple-tv-1-first-generation/

...and this program:

http://code.google.com/p/atvusb-creator/

might help if you haven't already jailbroken your ATV.
